text:
Question 105) An organic food must present in its packaging the seal of a certifying institution, ensuring the consumer that, besides being a pesticide food, is also produced with planned and controlled techniques. The production technique of these foods causes less impact on natural resources, contributing to improve people's quality of life.
In this plant food production system, insect control is managed through the
A) Green fertilization practice.
B) Employment of composting.
C) Soil irrigation control.
D) Use of natural predators.
E) Use of inoculated seeds with rhizobium.
